title: "In a Previous Story He Stole My Girlfriend" - With Dominic Monaghan & Billy Boyd
itunes:title: "In a Previous Story He Stole My Girlfriend" - With Dominic Monaghan & Billy Boyd
description:
This week your three favorite Halflings share some second breakfast and have a good chin wag with your two favorite Hobbits! Star Trek, Insects, DnD, waving your geek flag high, and running over your food with a car are all on the agenda. This is not one to miss!

Find The Friendship Onion

If you enjoy this podcast please help us out by leaving a review and sharing with your fellow adventurers.

Support us on Patreon at patreon.com/tbhalflings for your Shirefolk Shoutout and Bonus Episodes.

Connect with us on Twitter, Instagram and Facebook @tbhalflings, on our Discord or email secondbreakfast@tbhalflings.com

Theme Music by Jonathan Charles

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
